[Learn More & Register](https://www.tarabrach.com/calendar/conscious-loving-six-week-course/) [Tara Brach, Ph.D.](https://www.tarabrach.com/about/) is a meditation teacher, psychologist and author of several books including international bestselling Radical Acceptance, Radical Compassion and Trusting the Gold. Her teaching blends Western psychology and Eastern spiritual practices, mindful attention to our inner life, and a full, compassionate engagement with our world. Tara is the founder of the [Insight Meditation Community of Washington](https://www.imcw.org) and, together with Jack Kornfield, has co-founded [Cloud Sangha](https://www.cloudsangha.co) and the [Mindfulness Meditation Teacher Training Program](https://mmtcp.soundstrue.com), which serves participants from 74 countries around the world. Take time each week to practice RAIN with a supportive community and deepen your practice as you work with specific challenging emotions and limiting beliefs.
